Package openthinks.libs.i18n.implement.bundle

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBundleMessageType
    Used to implemented for customized IMessageType
    Need to use a combination of BundleMessageContext
    Useage:
    public enum DefaultBundleMessageType implements IBundleMessageType {
     LOG, EXCEPTION, UI;

     public String value() {
      return toString() + ":" + BASE_PACK_DIR + toString();
     }

     public String getPackName() {
      String packName = null;
      String val = value();
      if (val != null) {
       int split = val.indexOf(":");
       if (-1 != split) {
        packName = val.substring(split + 1);
       }
      }
      return packName;
     }

     public String getPackType() {
      String packType = null;
      String val = value();
      if (val != null) {
       int split = val.indexOf(":");
       if (-1 != split) {
        packType = val.substring(0, split);
       }
      }
      return packType;
     }

     public static final String BASE_PACK_DIR = "resource/i18n/";
    }
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBundleMessageType
    The implements need support the method value() to return the string as format : [type:]<full-path> For example
    Log:resource/i18n/Log
    BundleMessage
    Bundle message hold bundle file i18n message.
    BundleMessageContext  
    BundleMessagePack
    Use ResourceBundle to implement the function of i18n.
    BundleMessagePackManager
    Factory of BundleMessagePack
